episode38.name: 38   NCAA Tourney Wrap Up, Petrino Crash Anniversary, and Spring Football
episode38.description: We discuss the NCAA final four results and take one last shot at Kentucky's John Calipari for this season. We take a trip down memory lane and discuss the anniversary of Bobby Petrino's eventful motorcycle crash and the events that followed. Then we take a brief look at the diamond hogs and spring football.
